Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

-- Damage = 12, Swing Damage = 18 -- 17% chance to destroy a part entirely. -- If the part is a torso, or head, i-i-i-insta-kill
local Tool = script.Parent local Club = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true
local damage
local staticDamage = 12 local swingDamage = 18
local clubSound
local vCharacter
function blow(hit) if hit.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then local destroy = math.random(1, 100) rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm ~= nil then rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if rightGrip ~= nil and (rightGrip.Part0 == Club or rightGrip.Part1 == Club) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) print(damage) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) damage = staticDamage if destroy < 17 then if hit.Name == "Torso" or hit.Name == "Head" then print(hit.Name) humanoid:TakeDamage(500) end hit:BreakJoints() end wait(1.5) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid end end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then tag = humanoid:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag:Remove() end end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end
clubSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("ClubSound") damage = swingDamage if clubSound then clubSound:Play() end wait(2.0) damage = staticDamage Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() if clubSound then clubSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Club.Touched:connect(blow)

local Tool = script.Parent local Axe = Tool.Handle
local slamAnim local vCharacter
function onActivated() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end
slamAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ClubSlam)
if slamAnim then slamAnim:Play() end
end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() if slamAnim then slamAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
